Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.job

Class JobUpdateUtils

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.job.JobUpdateUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueItemUpdateNotifierInterface
public class JobUpdateUtils extends Object implements ValueItemUpdateNotifierInterface
Methods for update of value items of JobInput instances
Author:
Achim Zielesny

    • notifyDependentValueItemsForUpdate

      public void notifyDependentValueItemsForUpdate(ValueItem anUpdateNotifierValueItem)
      Notify dependent value items of container for update
      Specified by:
      notifyDependentValueItemsForUpdate in interface ValueItemUpdateNotifierInterface
      Parameters:
      anUpdateNotifierValueItem - Value item that notifies update

    • getIncompatibleParticlesForCurrentParticleSet

      public String getIncompatibleParticlesForCurrentParticleSet(JobInput aJobInput)
      Returns incompatible particles of job input with current particle set. If null is returned all particles of job input are compatible with current particle set.
      Parameters:
      aJobInput - Job input (may be null then null is returned)
      Returns:
      Incompatible particles of job input with current particle set. If null is returned all particles of job input are compatible with current particle set.

    • correctParticlesAndInteractions

      public JobInput correctParticlesAndInteractions(JobInput aJobInput)
      Corrects particles and particle interactions of job input according to available particle scripts. NOTE: If correction is necessary all updates of dependent value items are performed.
      Parameters:
      aJobInput - Job input
      Returns:
      Corrected job input (if correction was necessary)
